description: In this very first week there was an introduction to programming it self. To practic it we had to develpo a little prpogram in scratch. I coded a cool Bus driving game.

In Mario (More), I had to code one of this Pyramides that Mario jumped over in the game, several times. While in Credit I coded a validation for creditcards, that outputs if a valid number is given, the credit card company to, like AMAX, Visa and MasterCard.

In Scrable I coded a programm, that counted how much a word would scroe like in Scrable. And compared it to an other word. The programm redability takes a text and give you in which class level this Text would have been written from 0 to level 16+. Worle from CS50 is like the well gnown game where you have to guess a n letter word within n+1 guesses.

In the lab Sort I have to finde out which sorting Algorythem was used with the help of diverent sorted data Sets. Plurality was coded to simulates a plurality vote as same as Tideman simulates a Tideman vote.

In the lab Volume I coded a programm to increas or decrease the volume of a .wav file. In Filter (More) diferent kinde of filters can be applied to a given Picture. And Recover was coded to recover JPEGs from forensic images.
The lab Inheritance simulates the the blood types in a family tree. Speller takes a dictionary and look in a given text for all misspelled words and write them in a seperate file.

projects: Sentimental / Hello, Sentimental / Mario (More), Sentimental / Credit, Sentimental / Readability, DNA
description: In this week a new language was introduced Python. With Python a bunch of privious coded programms was coded again, in a shorter time period than before. Additional the lab World Cup was coded an tested on different time of runs. While the accuracy increases the time of running the programm increases too. In DNA a programm was developed that identivys to whom a specific DNA belongs to.

This weeks lab was about querieng a database and answering simple questions. In Movies it was the same and than in Fiftyville it gets interesting. The task was to finde the thife of CS50 duck. Diverent tabels of the database has to been joined on differente tags, and at the end the thife was found.

In Trivia a simple webpage was coded that asks a user some questions and show him or her the answer. Homepage should be a bit more complex and I decided to code this Page here, so I can presentat what I have learened in CS50 and satisfy the given requierements. But the code that I provided is on a view parts differnet to the one here ;-).

language: Flask, HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, SQL
description: In Birthdays, it was about transvering data from the Forntend, to the Backend and to the Database, and all the way back. While in Finance all the same was done, with some extras. The Frontend and Backend is a bit more complex and the Backend not just only comunicate with the database and Frontend, as en extra data is fetched from an external API.

I decided to make a Web Application namend Fancy CV Maker. Also I decided to make the Backend Node.js with typescript and the Frontend React with typescript. But it is in progress, so happy coding :-)
